div.p: Code for method by which the observation result was validated, e.g., human review, sliding average.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/qicore/CodeSystem/qicore-observation-verification defines the following codes:

tr.td: The observation was reviewed and verified by a person
The observation was verified against a sliding average

description.value: Code for method by which the observation result was validated, e.g., human review, sliding average.

definition.value: The observation was reviewed and verified by a person
The observation was verified against a sliding average
